title: Black screen of death

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: We don't even live close with each other

replies.body:
Bad boys bad boys, Watcha gonna do...

Watcha gonna do in low priority Queue.

What a bunch of bad bois.

You shall be punished.
